title: Generate version.json from local git
message: Stop using the GitHub API to populate src/version.json and instead gather metadata from the local repository via git (using child_process.execSync). The generator now extracts short hash, commit date, title, and body, writes version.json and logs the result; it falls back to a minimal entry if git is unavailable. This removes reliance on API auth/rate limits and enables offline builds, and updates src/version.json metadata accordingly.
